verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I stand to praise You, but I fall on my knees My spirit is willing but my flesh is so weak{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}So light the fire (Light the fire) In my soul (In my weary soul) Fan the flame (Fan the flame) Make me whole (Make my spirit whole) Lord, You know (Lord, You know) Where I’ve been (Where I’ve been) So light the fire in my heart again.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I feel Your arms around me As the power of Your healing begins{/lang-eng}
